title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build autonomous code improvement agents with Amazon Nova 2 Lite (AIM429)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 构建自主代码改进代理 (AIM429)
abstract: Dive deep into the reasoning capabilities of Amazon Nova 2 Lite to create intelligent agents that understand and improve your codebase autonomously. Watch live coding to learn practical implementation patterns, architectural considerations for long-horizon agentic workflows, and how to transform manual code maintenance into intelligent, automated engineering solutions.
abstract_cn: 深入探索 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 的推理能力，创建能够自主理解和改进代码库的智能代理。通过实时编程学习实用的实现模式、长期代理工作流的架构考虑，以及如何将手动代码维护转变为智能化、自动化的工程解决方案。
